channel.title: The Conscious CEO Series
channel.description: This feed provides insights into the skills and techniques that a conscious CEO can utilize in performing their responsibilities. It includes insights into how to facilitate your Board being more strategic, and how to embed strategy into the operations of your organization. It is aimed at CEOs and Directors of Boards, and provides strategies, techniques and examples of how to function from strategic awareness.

item.title: Conscious CEO-What Boards need to know about Risk
item.description: The Australian Institute of Company Directors interviews Steven Bowman on what Boards need to know about risk. Steven discusses what risk really is, the key problems Boards have with risk, how Boards should view risk, tips on identifying risk, and what Boards could be doing in tough economic times with risk. Warning...This interview is not what you think it is...Steven views risk from a very different point of view to most people.
item.author: steven@conscious-governance.com (Steven Bowman)

item.title: Conscious CEO-How do we remove unproductive or disruptive Directors
item.description: This episode is an interview and discussion with Steven Bowman from www.conscious-governance.com and Dr Terrie Temkin from www.CoreStrategies4Nonprofits.com which explores the options for dealing with and removing unproductive or disruptive Directors.
item.author: steven@conscious-governance.com (Steven Bowman)

item.title: Conscious CEO-Strategic Reporting to the Board
item.description: This episode is an interview and discussion with Steven Bowman from www.conscious-governance.com and Dr Terrie Temkin from www.CoreStrategies4Nonprofits.com which explores structuring Board reports so they are more strategic and focus the Board on key strategic issues.
item.author: steven@conscious-governance.com (Steven Bowman)

item.title: Conscious CEO-Relationship between Chair and CEO
item.description: This episode explores how the Chair and the CEO can work together more productively. We discuss four key issues and how the conscious CEO can further improve their relationship with the Chair.
item.author: steven@conscious-governance.com (Steven Bowman)

item.title: Conscious CEO-Conscious, Unconscious and Anti-conscious states of leadership
item.description: This podcast describes the three states that a CEO or leader can choose to function as - conscious, unconscious or anti-conscious. There is also a discussion on what you can do, as a leader, to choose to be more aware and conscious. In particular there is a short discussion on how to choose prosperity consciousness over the scarcity paradigm, and its effect on decision making at all levels.
item.author: steven@conscious-governance.com (Steven Bowman)

item.title: Conscious CEO-The CEO Syndrome
item.description: The CEO Syndrome is one of the greatest threats facing leaders today-making decisions based on information that is partial, incomplete or filtered. This podcast describes how leaders create this situation, and the three tools we can use to prevent this from happening-receiving all without judgment, living as the question, and being interesting point of view.
item.author: steven@conscious-governance.com (Steven Bowman)

item.title: Conscious CEO-The Secret to Using Risk as Strategic Advantage
item.description: This podcast investigates what most CEOs misidentify as risk, and how reframing risk can lead to strategic opportunity for your organization. Strategies for risk identification and risk treatment are identified, and the Boards role in risk management is discussed. For more information, go to www.lifemastery.com.au
item.author: steven@conscious-governance.com (Steven Bowman)

item.title: Conscious CEO-Using Vision and Mission statements to unlock innovation
item.description: This podcast discusses how to create Vision statements that actually make a difference, how to use the Vision statement to unlock innovation, and how to embed the vision statement into the work of the Board, staff and organization.
item.author: steven@conscious-governance.com (Steven Bowman)

item.title: Conscious CEO-Developing KPIs for strategic focus
item.description: This podcast discusses the three types of KPIs for the CEO, and how to establish KPIs for the Board. It provides examples, and discusses the role of the annual report in moving the Board from being operational to being strategic.
item.author: steven@conscious-governance.com (Steven Bowman)

item.title: Conscious CEO-Using Board Evaluations-the secrets
item.description: This podcast discusses how to develop Board Evaluations, what questions to ask, how to analyse the responses, and what to do with the results so that the Board can move to a more strategic focus.
item.author: steven@conscious-governance.com (Steven Bowman)

item.title: Conscious CEO-Questions that make difference
item.description: This podcast talks about how to live as the question, and which questions provide strategic insight and open up further possibilities. The tools provided here can fundamentally change how a CEO interacts with the Board and staff.
item.author: steven@conscious-governance.com (Steven Bowman)

item.title: Conscious CEO-Strategic Board Agenda
item.description: This podcast discusses the role of the Board agenda, and how to embed the strategic plan into the work of the Board
item.author: steven@conscious-governance.com (Steven Bowman)

item.title: Conscious CEO-Strategic Plans
item.description: This podcast discusses the role of the strategic plan in assisting Boards to be more strategic, including structuring agendas, reports and accountability
item.author: steven@conscious-governance.com (Steven Bowman)

item.title: Intro-Moving your Board from Operational to Strategic
item.author: steven@conscious-governance.com (Steven Bowman)
